1949.HK.summary: Platt Nera International Limited provides IT integrated solutions and support services to financial institutions, government departments, and agencies primarily in administrative, telecommunications, and utilities sectors in Thailand. Its IT integrated solutions comprise a range of services, including design and planning, assessment of hardware and/or software options, sourcing and sale of hardware and/or software, system installation, and launch to trial operation and maintenance, such as system upgrades for existing systems. The company also provides operational, support, upgrade, and maintenance services to IT system. Platt Nera International Limited was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Platt Nera International Limited is a subsidiary of Pynk Holding Limited.

AI.BK.summary: Asian Insulators Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes porcelain insulators products for electricity distribution and transmission lines. It offers spool, strain, line post type, pin post type, suspension, station post type, cleat, porcelain, and horizontal mounting solid core line post insulators; and underground cable support products. The company provides services for design, supply, and installation of high voltage substation, distribution, and transmission line systems; and project management, industrial maintenance, construction, and engineering services to the water, power, and communications industries. It is also involved in producing and distributing biodiesel, vegetable oil, and other fuel oil; and exporting vegetable oil under the Pamola brand. In addition, the company offers local and overseas logistics services for passenger, merchandise, parcel, and other materials; and ports and rental tank farms services. Further, it trades in electrical equipment. Asian Insulators Public Company Limited was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

AIT.BK.long_name: Advanced Information Technology Public Company Limited
AIT.BK.summary: Advanced Information Technology Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, designs, sells, installs, services, repairs, maintains, and trains information and communication technology network systems in Thailand. The company operates in two segments, Sales and Service, and Rental of Equipment. It provides solutions, including carrier grade router/switch, Web/video caching, DDOS protection, software-defined networking or the network controlled by the program to work as defined, network function virtualization, and other. The company also offers data center and cloud solutions, such as consolidation and virtualization, unified data center, converged and hyper converged infrastructure, private and public cloud infrastructure, software-defined networking or the network controlled by the program, and other. In addition, it provides collaboration solutions comprising communication through IP/VoIP system or unified communication, video and Web conferencing, contact center, and others; and various enterprise network solutions consisting of router, switch, wireless LAN, WAN optimization, security, application delivery control, DNS server, identity system, network management, and other. Further, the company offers the services in the development of information technology systems to various projects with the combination of concepts in applying technology with the framework in developing the system accordingly. Additionally, it provides managed services managing complicated IT system; and maintenance service on checking the operational condition of the system, which enables the system to operate continually and reduce the downtime period, and preventing problem to occur simultaneously, as well as spare parts for saving the time in solving the problem and mitigating the risks from the damage of equipment. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

AJA-R.BK.long_name: AJ Advance Technology Public Company Limited
AJA-R.BK.summary: AJ Advance Technology Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the wholesale and retail of electric appliances under the AJ brand in Thailand. It retails and wholesales audio and visual products, home appliances, mobile phones, and accessories. The company also provides top-up services for prepaid phone and service prepaid kiosks. In addition, it is also involved in the distribution of sport shoes; retail of top-up machines; logistic and export business, including TV drama programs and other entertainment media businesses; and provision of e-money services and accept payment through electronic methods. The company was formerly known as Crown Tech Advance Public Company Limited and changed its sport shoes name to AJ Advance Technology Public Company Limited in June 2017. AJ Advance Technology Public Company Limited was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

AJA.BK.long_name: AJ Advance Technology Public Company Limited
AJA.BK.summary: AJ Advance Technology Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the wholesale and retail of electric appliances under the AJ brand in Thailand. It retails and wholesales audio and visual products, home appliances, mobile phones, and accessories. The company also provides top-up services for prepaid phone and service prepaid kiosks. In addition, it is also involved in the distribution of sport shoes; retail of top-up machines; logistic and export business, including TV drama programs and other entertainment media businesses; and provision of e-money services and accept payment through electronic methods. The company was formerly known as Crown Tech Advance Public Company Limited and changed its sport shoes name to AJ Advance Technology Public Company Limited in June 2017. AJ Advance Technology Public Company Limited was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

AKR-R.BK.summary: Ekarat Engineering Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes transformers and solar farms in Thailand. It also distributes solar cells and solar panel; and engages in the solar electric power business. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

AKR.BK.summary: Ekarat Engineering Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes transformers and solar farms in Thailand. It also distributes solar cells and solar panel; and engages in the solar electric power business. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

ALT.BK.summary: ALT Telecom Public Company Limited engages in the manufacture, installation, maintenance, rental, and sale of telecommunication network equipment in Thailand and internationally. It operates through three segments: Network Equipment and Electricity Meter Distribution, Network Equipment Installation Business, and Network Equipment Rental Business. The company also manufactures, assembles, installs, and distributes electricity meter; and offers telecommunication products comprising fiber optic cables, telecom shelters, antennas, batteries, and other telecommunication equipment, as well as rapid deployment products. In addition, it is involved in the construction of base stations; installation of equipment and optical fiber cables; lease and management of telecommunication basic structures; and sale, installation, and maintenance of electrical equipment and systems. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Bang Kruay, Thailand.

APP-R.BK.summary: Applicad Public Company Limited sells computer programs and provides maintenance services for computer programs. The company offers computer software for engineering, construction, and architecture services; computer and spare parts; and machines and equipment, as well as materials and other products. It offers education solution and other related services, as well as designs and manufactures industrial parts and prototypes. In addition, the company distributes AutoCAD drawing, 3D pipe drawing, and 3D software in industrial design. The company is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

APP.BK.summary: Applicad Public Company Limited sells computer programs and provides maintenance services for computer programs. The company offers computer software for engineering, construction, and architecture services; computer and spare parts; and machines and equipment, as well as materials and other products. It offers education solution and other related services, as well as designs and manufactures industrial parts and prototypes. In addition, the company distributes AutoCAD drawing, 3D pipe drawing, and 3D software in industrial design. The company is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

CCET-R.BK.summary: Cal-Comp Electronics (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the manufacture of electronic products worldwide. The company offers computers and computer peripherals, such as mainboards, external hard disk drives, NAS and PCBA for hard disk drives, USB pen drives, storage server PCBA, and assembly products, as well as ink-jet printers, laser printers, multi-function printers, dot-matrix printers, and large format printers; telecommunication products, including set-top boxes and their component parts, and Bluetooth headsets; and smart appliances that comprise smart TV, mirrors, and POS machines, as well as digital camera PCBA and media players. It also provides consumer electronics, which include facial cleaning brushes, iron brushes, cordless airbrush makeup kits, displays, electronic keyboards, hubs, rovers, and calculators; intelligent warehouse, machinery, and robotics, as well as smart factory products; smart beauty products comprising facial moisturizing sprays, facial cleaning brushes, facial massagers, and electric toothbrushes; and healthcare and wearable devices. In addition, the company offers semiconductor design and packaging services; and robotic applications for edutainment and smart service products. Cal-Comp Electronics (Thailand) Public Company Limited was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

CCET.BK.summary: Cal-Comp Electronics (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the manufacture of electronic products worldwide. The company offers computers and computer peripherals, such as mainboards, external hard disk drives, NAS and PCBA for hard disk drives, USB pen drives, storage server PCBA, and assembly products, as well as ink-jet printers, laser printers, multi-function printers, dot-matrix printers, and large format printers; telecommunication products, including set-top boxes and their component parts, and Bluetooth headsets; and smart appliances that comprise smart TV, mirrors, and POS machines, as well as digital camera PCBA and media players. It also provides consumer electronics, which include facial cleaning brushes, iron brushes, cordless airbrush makeup kits, displays, electronic keyboards, hubs, rovers, and calculators; intelligent warehouse, machinery, and robotics, as well as smart factory products; smart beauty products comprising facial moisturizing sprays, facial cleaning brushes, facial massagers, and electric toothbrushes; and healthcare and wearable devices. In addition, the company offers semiconductor design and packaging services; and robotic applications for edutainment and smart service products. Cal-Comp Electronics (Thailand) Public Company Limited was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

CIG-R.BK.summary: C.I. Group Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes air conditioning and refrigeration products and parts in Thailand. The company provides D-Coat, 5MM, aluminum, condenser, water, evaporator, and tube-in-tube exchanger coils; heavy duty air purifiers, air handling units, air cooled condensers, condensing units, unit coolers, and air purifier; and chillers. It also offers building envelope products, such as KingZip, a zipped roofing system; K-Dek; foilback systems, including gutters, safety systems, light solutions, and specialist fabrications; BENCHMARK and Kingspan insulated products; architectural wall panels; and cold store systems. In addition, the company provides ARII smart solutions, a software solution for energy and environmental meters, and cold room packs. Further, it offers coil replacement and AHU renovation; M&E design; and cold room/store and smart solutions design and installation services. Additionally, the company provides maintenance and inspection services for air conditioning and refrigeration products and parts; locomotive construction and maintenance services; and construction of electricity production and distribution systems, as well as operates a hotel. It offers its products directly to customers in Asia and Europe; and through sales agents in the United States, Canada, Australia, and New Zealand. C.I. Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Pathum Thani, Thailand.

CIG.BK.summary: C.I. Group Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes air conditioning and refrigeration products and parts in Thailand. The company provides D-Coat, 5MM, aluminum, condenser, water, evaporator, and tube-in-tube exchanger coils; heavy duty air purifiers, air handling units, air cooled condensers, condensing units, unit coolers, and air purifier; and chillers. Additionally, the company provides maintenance and inspection services for air conditioning and refrigeration products and parts; locomotive construction and maintenance services; and construction of electricity production and distribution systems, as well as operates a hotel. It offers its products directly to customers in Asia and Europe; and through sales agents in the United States, Canada, Australia, and New Zealand. C.I. Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Pathum Thani, Thailand.

COM7-R.BK.summary: Com7 Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, sells IT products, mobiles, and accessories in Thailand. The company also develops computer software; provides repair and other services, as well as training services; and offers ICT infrastructure solutions. In addition, it engages in distribution activities. The company offers products through its retail outlets. Com7 Public Company Limited is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

COMAN-R.BK.summary: Comanche International Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides information technology solutions for hotels and serviced apartments. It offers hospitality industry management systems with integrated modules, such as front office, point of sale, call accounting, back office with accounts payable, accounts receivable, general ledger, and inventory control. The company also sells computers and computer software, as well as provides maintenance services and other services relating to computer software. It operates in Thailand, Myanmar, Vietnam, Laos, Australia, Cambodia, Hong Kong, Macau, China, Japan, Indonesia, the Philippines, Maldives, Malaysia, Taiwan, India, Sri Lanka, and Singapore. The company was incorporated in 2003 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

COMAN.BK.summary: Comanche International Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides information technology solutions for hotels and serviced apartments. It offers hospitality industry management systems with integrated modules, such as front office, point of sale, call accounting, back office with accounts payable, accounts receivable, general ledger, and inventory control. The company also sells computers and computer software, as well as provides maintenance services and other services relating to computer software. It operates in Thailand, Myanmar, Vietnam, Laos, Australia, Cambodia, Hong Kong, Macau, China, Japan, Indonesia, the Philippines, Maldives, Malaysia, Taiwan, India, Sri Lanka, and Singapore. The company was incorporated in 2003 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

CPW-R.BK.summary: Copperwired Public Company Limited retails, distributes, and repairs computers, mobile phones, and accessories in Thailand. The company offers audio equipment, health and fitness devices, smart electrical appliances for homes and offices, smartphones and tablets, smartwatches, and various accessories. It offers its products through various stores under the dotlife, iStudio, U-Store, and iServe names, as well as e-commerce channels, comprising of www.istudio.store and www.dotlife.store. The company was incorporated in 2019 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand. Copperwired Public Company Limited operates as a subsidiary of Vnet Capital Co., Ltd.

CPW.BK.summary: Copperwired Public Company Limited retails, distributes, and repairs computers, mobile phones, and accessories in Thailand. The company offers audio equipment, health and fitness devices, smart electrical appliances for homes and offices, smartphones and tablets, smartwatches, and various accessories. It offers its products through various stores under the dotlife, iStudio, U-Store, and iServe names, as well as e-commerce channels, comprising of www.istudio.store and www.dotlife.store. The company was incorporated in 2019 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand. Copperwired Public Company Limited operates as a subsidiary of Vnet Capital Co., Ltd.

CSS.BK.long_name: Communication & System Solution Public Company Limited
CSS.BK.summary: Communication & System Solution Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, distributes and installs production equipment for electricity, water, air conditioning, and telecommunication systems in Thailand. The company operates through two segments, Distribution Electrical Equipment and Installation Service. The Distribution Electrical Equipment segment supplies electrical cables and other electrical systems equipment, and passive fire protection materials and equipment. The Installation Service segment designs and installs telecommunication and fire protection systems. It also distributes and installs tubes. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

FORTH-R.BK.summary: Forth Corporation Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes telecommunication and electronic equipment, and assembly electronic parts in Thailand. Its Electronics Manufacturing Service Business segment designs, manufactures, and assembles circuit boards and electronic equipment; and supplies and distributes semiconductor parts, such as IC, transistor, diode, optoelectronics display device relay, battery, connector, electric buzzer, power switch, EMC, filter, thermal printer, capacitor, resistor, crystal oscillator, etc. The company's Enterprise Solutions Business segment engages in the design, system implementation, installation, and maintenance of telecommunication network and information systems; vehicle tracking systems distribution services; and data transmission devices distribution services; enterprise resource management systems; electronic meters distribution services; LED lighting products and lighting equipment procurement and distribution services; aircraft distribution and maintenance repair, and operations services; and traffic system distribution services. This segment also offers smart grid solutions; and Forth Taglock EM, an electronic ankle harness used for track and monitor temporarily released suspects or defendants. Its Smart Service Business segment provides electronic payment acceptance, bill payment, and electronic money services, as well as personal loans; sells canned or bottled beverages, snacks, consumer products, and coffee through vending machines; offers mobile, e-wallet, and game top-up services, utility and phone bills payment service, and money deposit services; and provides electric vehicle charging equipment under the EV NET. The company also provides consulting services for information management and computer software management; engineering; and e-commerce services. Forth Corporation Public Company Limited was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

FORTH.BK.summary: Forth Corporation Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes telecommunication and electronic equipment, and assembly electronic parts in Thailand. Its Electronics Manufacturing Service Business segment designs, manufactures, and assembles circuit boards and electronic equipment; and supplies and distributes semiconductor parts, such as IC, transistor, diode, optoelectronics display device relay, battery, connector, electric buzzer, power switch, EMC, filter, thermal printer, capacitor, resistor, crystal oscillator, etc. The company's Enterprise Solutions Business segment engages in the design, system implementation, installation, and maintenance of telecommunication network and information systems; vehicle tracking systems distribution services; and data transmission devices distribution services; enterprise resource management systems; electronic meters distribution services; LED lighting products and lighting equipment procurement and distribution services; aircraft distribution and maintenance repair, and operations services; and traffic system distribution services. This segment also offers smart grid solutions; and Forth Taglock EM, an electronic ankle harness used for track and monitor temporarily released suspects or defendants. Its Smart Service Business segment provides electronic payment acceptance, bill payment, and electronic money services, as well as personal loans; sells canned or bottled beverages, snacks, consumer products, and coffee through vending machines; offers mobile, e-wallet, and game top-up services, utility and phone bills payment service, and money deposit services; and provides electric vehicle charging equipment under the EV NET. The company also provides consulting services for information management and computer software management; engineering; and e-commerce services. Forth Corporation Public Company Limited was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

HAA1.F.summary: Hana Microelectronics Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and trades in electronic components. It offers printed circuit board and integrated circuit assemblies, as well as produces liquid crystal on silicon devices that are being used for microdisplays and optical telecommunications components. The company also provides agent and customer services. It has operations in Malaysia, China, the United States, Singapore, Hong Kong, and internationally. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

HANA.BK.summary: Hana Microelectronics Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and trades in electronic components. It offers printed circuit board and integrated circuit assemblies, as well as produces liquid crystal on silicon devices that are being used for microdisplays and optical telecommunications components. The company also provides agent and customer services. It has operations in Malaysia, China, the United States, Singapore, Hong Kong, and internationally. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

HUMAN-R.BK.summary: Humanica Public Company Limited provides various human resource services and solutions in Thailand, Singapore, Japan, and Malaysia. It operates through Human Resources Solutions and Financial Solutions segments. The company offers Humatrix, a human resource and payroll management solution for mid to large corporations, including manufacturing, hospitality, healthcare, restaurants, and retail. It also offers human resource outsourcing and payroll services; enterprise resource planning and implementation services; payroll outsourcing services; P2P lending platform; and business consulting services to business optimization, business transformation, and business expansion. In addition, the company provides design, develops content, and creating educational solutions, including sale of mobile based learning management solutions; business application of systems management, human resource, and payroll programs; and distributes technologies, including record time such as time recording machines, ace scanners, fingerprint scanners, and hand card machines, etc. Further, it engages in the development and sale of human resource solutions software, as well as provides property management services. The company provides accounting and financial services, which consists of managing accounting information, financial planning advisory, accounting, financial management, and tax services. It also offers brokerage services to provide cutting-edge platforms for employee welfare management, such as healthcare and wellness, as well as operates as a comprehensive community for employees. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

HUMAN.BK.summary: Humanica Public Company Limited provides various human resource services and solutions in Thailand, Singapore, Japan, and Malaysia. It operates through Human Resources Solutions and Financial Solutions segments. The company offers Humatrix, a human resource and payroll management solution for mid to large corporations, including manufacturing, hospitality, healthcare, restaurants, and retail. It also offers human resource outsourcing and payroll services; enterprise resource planning and implementation services; payroll outsourcing services; P2P lending platform; and business consulting services to business optimization, business transformation, and business expansion. In addition, the company provides design, develops content, and creating educational solutions, including sale of mobile based learning management solutions; business application of systems management, human resource, and payroll programs; and distributes technologies, including record time such as time recording machines, ace scanners, fingerprint scanners, and hand card machines, etc. Further, it engages in the development and sale of human resource solutions software, as well as provides property management services. The company provides accounting and financial services, which consists of managing accounting information, financial planning advisory, accounting, financial management, and tax services. It also offers brokerage services to provide cutting-edge platforms for employee welfare management, such as healthcare and wellness, as well as operates as a comprehensive community for employees. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

IE2A.F.summary: Internet Thailand Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides Internet access, and information technology and communication integrated services for businesses and individuals in Thailand. The company operates through two segments, Access Business and Business Solutions. It offers full Internet access services with various speeds through leased lines and MetroLAN network connected to the offices' Intranet networks; and Internet data center services comprising business continuity planning/disaster recovery center, co-location, INET security center, and server leasing services for business organizations or agencies that need to present data through Internet/Intranet for public and private networks. The company also provides cloud services, which is a virtual computing service that includes infrastructure as a service, platform as a service, and software as a service; and EDC network pool services, which is a credit card payment system center linked between banks and other merchants through telecommunications networks, such as landline telephone, mobile phone, and Internet. In addition, it offers online applications, such as online recruitment, mail services, etc. The company is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

IIG.BK.summary: I&I Group Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates as a digital and technology consulting company in Thailand. It operates through three segments: Customer Relationship Program, Enterprise Resource Planning Program, and Digital Marketing Services. The company provides consultation on computer systems; sells subscription; and provides support on computer software licenses. It also offers services in the areas of business analytics and marketing strategy, digital marketing, data management and technology, customer relationship and experience management, and placement service. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Ratchathewi, Thailand.

ILINK-R.BK.summary: Interlink Communication Public Company Limited imports and distributes IT network cabling system products in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: Distribution Business, Telecommunication Business, and Engineering Business. It also outsources the design and installation service of network and cabling systems for computers and telecommunications. In addition, the company operates as a telecommunication service provider, which invests in the construction of a fiber-optic cable network to provide high-speed leased line service; and a contractor in submarine cable and transmission lines, including fiber optic and high voltage. Further, it provides data center services, such as co-location and disaster recovery services to enterprise customers, as well as virtual server rental services; and broadcast services. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

ILINK.BK.summary: Interlink Communication Public Company Limited imports and distributes IT network cabling system products in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: Distribution Business, Telecommunication Business, and Engineering Business. It also outsources the design and installation service of network and cabling systems for computers and telecommunications. In addition, the company operates as a telecommunication service provider, which invests in the construction of a fiber-optic cable network to provide high-speed leased line service; and a contractor in submarine cable and transmission lines, including fiber optic and high voltage. Further, it provides data center services, such as co-location and disaster recovery services to enterprise customers, as well as virtual server rental services; and broadcast services. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

INET-R.BK.summary: Internet Thailand Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides Internet access, and information technology and communication integrated services for businesses and individuals in Thailand. The company operates through two segments, Access Business and Business Solutions. It offers full Internet access services with various speeds through leased lines and MetroLAN network connected to the offices' Intranet networks; and Internet data center services comprising business continuity planning/disaster recovery center, co-location, INET security center, and server leasing services for business organizations or agencies that need to present data through Internet/Intranet for public and private networks. The company also provides cloud services, which is a virtual computing service that includes infrastructure as a service, platform as a service, and software as a service; and EDC network pool services, which is a credit card payment system center linked between banks and other merchants through telecommunications networks, such as landline telephone, mobile phone, and Internet. In addition, it offers online applications, such as online recruitment, mail services, etc. The company is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

INET.BK.summary: Internet Thailand Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides Internet access, and information technology and communication integrated services for businesses and individuals in Thailand. The company operates through two segments, Access Business and Business Solutions. It offers full Internet access services with various speeds through leased lines and MetroLAN network connected to the offices' Intranet networks; and Internet data center services comprising business continuity planning/disaster recovery center, co-location, INET security center, and server leasing services for business organizations or agencies that need to present data through Internet/Intranet for public and private networks.
