In addition, it offers online applications, such as online recruitment, mail services, etc. The company is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

INSET-R.BK.summary: Infraset Public Company Limited designs and constructs engineering infrastructure in Thailand. The company constructs data centers, information technology and infrastructure, and telecommunication networks. It operates through three segments: Construct of Data Center and Information Technology; Infrastructure, Telecommunications and Transportation Infrastructure; and Maintenance and Services. The company was incorporated in 2006 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

INSET.BK.summary: Infraset Public Company Limited designs and constructs engineering infrastructure in Thailand. The company constructs data centers, information technology and infrastructure, and telecommunication networks. It operates through three segments: Construct of Data Center and Information Technology; Infrastructure, Telecommunications and Transportation Infrastructure; and Maintenance and Services. The company was incorporated in 2006 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

IRCP-R.BK.long_name: International Research Corporation Public Company Limited
IRCP-R.BK.summary: International Research Corporation Public Company Limited engages in the distribution and rendering system development services of information technology, network information, and telecommunication information systems in Thailand. The company operates in two segments, Project Business and Non-Project Business. It provides telecommunication network to connect points to points via fiber optic and wireless technologies, such as DWDM, SDH, Multiplexer, wireless, and broadband; next generation network solutions to link public telephone network with IP network that include VOIP, VDO, instant messaging, etc.; soft switch technology solutions; mobile telephone network solutions; FTTx networking total solutions; and 3G and LTE services. The company also offers solutions for enterprise, such as enterprise resource planning, enterprise application integration, data warehouse and business intelligence, custom application development, and implementation services. In addition, it provides software replication and pad printing services; and digital broadcasting solutions, including headend equipment, television transmission systems, new media, and content production solutions, as well as designs, builds, and installs digital TV system equipment for television and broadcasting industry. Additionally, it provides project management and maintenance services for integrated radio and television broadcasting systems. International Research Corporation Public Company Limited was founded in 1986 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

IRCP.BK.long_name: International Research Corporation Public Company Limited
IRCP.BK.summary: International Research Corporation Public Company Limited engages in the distribution and rendering system development services of information technology, network information, and telecommunication information systems in Thailand. The company operates in two segments, Project Business and Non-Project Business. It provides telecommunication network to connect points to points via fiber optic and wireless technologies, such as DWDM, SDH, Multiplexer, wireless, and broadband; next generation network solutions to link public telephone network with IP network that include VOIP, VDO, instant messaging, etc.; soft switch technology solutions; mobile telephone network solutions; FTTx networking total solutions; and 3G and LTE services. The company also offers solutions for enterprise, such as enterprise resource planning, enterprise application integration, data warehouse and business intelligence, custom application development, and implementation services. In addition, it provides software replication and pad printing services; and digital broadcasting solutions, including headend equipment, television transmission systems, new media, and content production solutions, as well as designs, builds, and installs digital TV system equipment for television and broadcasting industry. Additionally, it provides project management and maintenance services for integrated radio and television broadcasting systems. International Research Corporation Public Company Limited was founded in 1986 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

IT.BK.summary: IT City Public Company Limited engages in the retail of computers, tablets, peripherals, smartphones, and other related IT products under the IT CITY name. The company also offers Internet of Thing and gaming devices; IP, car, and action cameras; robots; 3G/4G air cards; mouse, keyboards, and computer software; ink and toner cartridges, printing paper, UPS, power banks, and power extension outlets; loudspeakers, headphones, optical drives, hard disks, computer components, network equipment, and cables; carry bags and smart phone accessories; digital LED TV's and home audio video devices; office equipment, photo copiers, sticker cutting machines, label printers, barcode scanners, projectors, etc.; small home appliances, such as air purifiers, small kitchen utensils, etc.; desktops, notebooks, and LCD and LED monitors; wearable devices; and printers, including ink jet, dot matrix, laser, and multi-function printers. In addition, it operates repair and maintenance service centers; supplies genuine parts; and provides technicians. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 350 branches. IT City Public Company Limited is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

KCE.BK.summary: KCE Electronics Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes electric printed circuit boards (PCBs) under the KCE trademark worldwide. The company's PCBs manufactured from copper clad laminate are used in various applications, including automotive, industrial, computer, and telecom systems. It also manufactures and distributes chemicals products, and prepreg and laminate products. The company was formerly known as Kuang Charoen Electronics Company Limited. KCE Electronics Public Company Limited was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

KCEA.SG.summary: KCE Electronics Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes electric printed circuit boards (PCBs) under the KCE trademark worldwide. The company's PCBs manufactured from copper clad laminate are used in various applications, including automotive, industrial, computer, and telecom systems. It also manufactures and distributes chemicals products, and prepreg and laminate products. The company was formerly known as Kuang Charoen Electronics Company Limited. KCE Electronics Public Company Limited was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

KYE-R.BK.long_name: Kang Yong Electric Public Company Limited
KYE-R.BK.summary: Kang Yong Electric Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes household electrical appliances in Thailand, Japan, and internationally. The company offers home electrical appliances, such as refrigerators, electric fans, ventilating fans, water pumps, and jet towels under the Mitsubishi Electric name. It also exports its products to approximately 20 countries. The company was formerly known as Kang Yong Electric Manufacturing Co., Ltd. Kang Yong Electric Public Company Limited was founded in 1964 and is based in Bang Phli, Thailand.

KYE.BK.long_name: Kang Yong Electric Public Company Limited
KYE.BK.summary: Kang Yong Electric Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes household electrical appliances in Thailand, Japan, and internationally. The company offers home electrical appliances, such as refrigerators, electric fans, ventilating fans, water pumps, and jet towels under the Mitsubishi Electric name. It also exports its products to approximately 20 countries. The company was formerly known as Kang Yong Electric Manufacturing Co., Ltd. Kang Yong Electric Public Company Limited was founded in 1964 and is based in Bang Phli, Thailand.

METCO-R.BK.summary: Muramoto Electron (Thailand) Public Company Limited manufactures and sells metal and plastic parts for audio/visual equipment; and electronic equipment for automobiles and office automation appliances in Thailand, Japan, the United States, and internationally. It operates through three segments: Electric Parts for Automotive Business, Electronic Parts for Office Automation Business, and Other Business. The company offers car related products, such as display audio units, audio panels, CD and DVD changers, gear units, air bag parts, keyless entry transmitters and receivers, corner sensors, press and window regulator parts, mounting boards for keyless entry receivers, print circuit board assemblies for CD changers, and mounting boards for cameras. It also manufactures video cameras and single-lens reflex camera products for consumers, including video camera LCD units, back cover and lens units for single lens reflex cameras, and top cover units for mirrorless cameras; and printer finished products and electronic parts, such as printer finished products, thermal fuses, hermetic terminals, and magnetron filter box parts for use in industrial applications. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Muramoto Electron (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Muramoto Industry Co., Ltd.

METCO.BK.summary: Muramoto Electron (Thailand) Public Company Limited manufactures and sells metal and plastic parts for audio/visual equipment; and electronic equipment for automobiles and office automation appliances in Thailand, Japan, the United States, and internationally. It operates through three segments: Electric Parts for Automotive Business, Electronic Parts for Office Automation Business, and Other Business. The company offers car related products, such as display audio units, audio panels, CD and DVD changers, gear units, air bag parts, keyless entry transmitters and receivers, corner sensors, press and window regulator parts, mounting boards for keyless entry receivers, print circuit board assemblies for CD changers, and mounting boards for cameras. It also manufactures video cameras and single-lens reflex camera products for consumers, including video camera LCD units, back cover and lens units for single lens reflex cameras, and top cover units for mirrorless cameras; and printer finished products and electronic parts, such as printer finished products, thermal fuses, hermetic terminals, and magnetron filter box parts for use in industrial applications. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Muramoto Electron (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Muramoto Industry Co., Ltd.

MFEC-R.BK.summary: MFEC Public Company Limited operates as an information technology (IT) services company in Thailand. The company operates through Systems Integration, Maintenance Service, and IT Professional Service segments. It provides securities trading, mobile financial, gamifcation, managed service, information service on mobile/tablet applications, advertisement/PR/marketing, service for platform management system, and ticketing system for all play types. The company also offers mobile products, software as a service, e-commerce, digital content, payment gateway, financial technology, consulting service and computer system development, IT project management and equipment management, outsourcing IT, audit, warranty management, maintenance, and system integration for cloud and office work. In addition, it provides business analytics, agent management, agent leader, smart quotation, eApplication, iClaim, legal tracking system, iCollection, appraisal collateral, and big data services. MFEC Public Company Limited was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

MFEC.BK.summary: MFEC Public Company Limited operates as an information technology (IT) services company in Thailand. The company operates through Systems Integration, Maintenance Service, and IT Professional Service segments. It provides securities trading, mobile financial, gamifcation, managed service, information service on mobile/tablet applications, advertisement/PR/marketing, service for platform management system, and ticketing system for all play types. The company also offers mobile products, software as a service, e-commerce, digital content, payment gateway, financial technology, consulting service and computer system development, IT project management and equipment management, outsourcing IT, audit, warranty management, maintenance, and system integration for cloud and office work. In addition, it provides business analytics, agent management, agent leader, smart quotation, eApplication, iClaim, legal tracking system, iCollection, appraisal collateral, and big data services. MFEC Public Company Limited was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

MSC.BK.long_name: Metro Systems Corporation Public Company Limited
MSC.BK.summary: Metro Systems Corporation Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in trading computers and equipment, software, supplies, and office equipment, as well as provision of related services in Thailand. The company provides server, storage, and network for IT infrastructure; backup, modernized application, and IBM I solutions for infrastructure; contractual, supplies, and outsourcing printing and services solutions for digital printing; and compute, network, storage, HCI, private, hybrid, public cloud, middleware and other, database, API, and backup and DR, as well as operating systems for digital infrastructure. It also offers businesses transformation, architecture design, application development, and infrastructure and managed service for digital transformation services; workforce and unified collaboration, mobility workforce, business process automation, and IT process management for digital collaboration; and SOLIDWORKS 3D CAD, simulation, electrical design, SOLIDWORKS product data management, and technical communication for designed and engineering solutions. In addition, it offers data integration tool, data platform, BI and data visualization, advance analytics and AI/ML, and data scientist platform. Further, it offers end point, network, server and data, cloud, and mobility security; and training and services. It also offers hardware products and office supplies. Metro Systems Corporation Public Company Limited was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

NETBAY-R.BK.summary: Netbay Public Company Limited creates, designs, and develops digital business technology platform and omni channel connectivity gateway solutions for the electronic business transaction exchange in the field of trading. The company provides digital business services, which include e-customs; customs e-payment; e-manifest, a paperless report for imports/ exports system; e-express; electronic transaction reporting gateway for financial institutes; customer due diligence gateways; and software development and cloud computing services. Its software as a service comprise data center, disaster recovery center, operating software system, which supports the electronic transaction reporting gateway, networking systems, and protection of information services. In addition, the company acts as electronic data interchange provider for electronic transaction reporting and audit report services for life insurance, non-life insurance, securities, asset management, and finance companies, as well as financial institutions and banks. Further, it offers electronics bank guarantee data interchange services between banks and Comptroller General's Department. It serves international and domestic trade, and service sectors; manufacturers, exporters, importers, freight forwarders, shipping agents, customs brokers, terminal operators, transportation service providers, and logistics and supply chain communities; ocean line, air, and express couriers; and the Thai Chamber of Commerce and Board of Trade of Thailand. Netbay Public Company Limited was founded in 2004 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

NETBAY.BK.summary: Netbay Public Company Limited creates, designs, and develops digital business technology platform and omni channel connectivity gateway solutions for the electronic business transaction exchange in the field of trading. The company provides digital business services, which include e-customs; customs e-payment; e-manifest, a paperless report for imports/ exports system; e-express; electronic transaction reporting gateway for financial institutes; customer due diligence gateways; and software development and cloud computing services. Its software as a service comprise data center, disaster recovery center, operating software system, which supports the electronic transaction reporting gateway, networking systems, and protection of information services. In addition, the company acts as electronic data interchange provider for electronic transaction reporting and audit report services for life insurance, non-life insurance, securities, asset management, and finance companies, as well as financial institutions and banks. Further, it offers electronics bank guarantee data interchange services between banks and Comptroller General's Department. It serves international and domestic trade, and service sectors; manufacturers, exporters, importers, freight forwarders, shipping agents, customs brokers, terminal operators, transportation service providers, and logistics and supply chain communities; ocean line, air, and express couriers; and the Thai Chamber of Commerce and Board of Trade of Thailand. Netbay Public Company Limited was founded in 2004 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

NEWS.BK.long_name: News Network Corporation Public Company Limited
NEWS.BK.summary: News Network Corporation Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, develops and sells software in Thailand. The company is also involved in procuring hardware products; distributing and servicing technology products; providing internet, mass communication, programs production, system integrator, and new media services, as well as news; and trading and servicing examining tools and equipment in occupational health activities. In addition, it provides information through online system and electronic media, as well as publishing production and distribution services; and distributes books, as well as distribution and installation services for environment projects. The company was formerly known as Solution Corner (1998) Public Company Limited and changed its name to News Network Corporation Public Company Limited in April 2015. News Network Corporation Public Company Limited is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

NEX.BK.summary: Nex Point Public Company Limited designs, manufactures, and sells electronic products in Thailand. It also offers software, and application and platform for large logistics management system; property procurement services; financial technology services; and installation and consulting services for computer systems, as well as sells hardware and software products; and rents and sells buses. In addition, the company is involved in the transportation and logistics, supply assets, labor, and property rental businesses. In addition, it creates, develops, and customizes computer software for IT services. The company was formerly known as Single Point Parts (Thailand) Public Company Limited and changed its name to Nex Point Public Company Limited in May 2019. Nex Point Public Company Limited was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Samut Prakan, Thailand.

NVAX.F.summary: Hana Microelectronics Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and trades in electronic components. It offers printed circuit board and integrated circuit assemblies, as well as produces liquid crystal on silicon devices that are being used for microdisplays and optical telecommunications components. The company also provides agent and customer services. It has operations in Malaysia, China, the United States, Singapore, Hong Kong, and internationally. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

NVPA.F.summary: KCE Electronics Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes electric printed circuit boards (PCBs) under the KCE trademark worldwide. The company's PCBs manufactured from copper clad laminate are used in various applications, including automotive, industrial, computer, and telecom systems. It also manufactures and distributes chemicals products, and prepreg and laminate products. The company was formerly known as Kuang Charoen Electronics Company Limited. KCE Electronics Public Company Limited was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

PLANET.BK.long_name: Planet Communications Asia Public Company Limited
PLANET.BK.summary: Planet Communications Asia Public Company Limited engages in the distribution, installation, and maintenance of telecommunication equipment in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: Products and Solution, Services, and Service Provider. It offers telecommunications technology products, such as satellite earth station, wireless network, digital radio communications, and optical fiber network systems; smart office solutions comprising telepresence and video conference, centralized telecommunications system, audio conference, closed circuit television, and Internet network/Wi-Fi; cyber security solutions, consisting of network security, transaction security, and fire wall; and digital broadcasting solutions, which includes television program production system, multimedia and content production studio, content distribution and transmission, and terrestrial digital television set-top box. The company also provides satellite mobile vehicle; mobile phone and radio jammer for military operations and security; and peripheral and accessories, such as cables and connectors, and fiber optic components. In addition, it offers pre-sale, implementation and installation, after sales, and rental services for telecommunication equipment and systems. Further, the company provides PlanetFiber that offers high-speed internet through fiber optic networks for mid- and high-rise condominiums; and PlanetCloud, which provides cloud services for the office. It serves broadcasting, telecommunications service provider, commercial, public, and international sectors. The company was formerly known as Technology Gateway Asia Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Planet Communications Asia Public Company Limited in 1998. Planet Communications Asia Public Company Limited was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

PT.BK.summary: Premier Technology Public Company Limited, through its subsidiary, Datapro Computer Systems Company Limited, distributes and provides services relating to computer and computer systems in Thailand. It develops its own products; and distributes products of other companies. The company's products include hardware and software products, including IT and multimedia products; and system and data management, and application software. It also offers annual maintenance, training and consulting, outsourcing, and other services; and engages in the rental of an office building. The company was formerly known as Premier Engineering and Technology Public Company Limited and changed its name to Premier Technology Public Company Limited in October 2006. Premier Technology Public Company Limited was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SICT-R.BK.long_name: Silicon Craft Technology Public Company Limited
SICT-R.BK.summary: Silicon Craft Technology Public Company Limited, an integrated circuit (IC) design company, designs, markets, and sells microchips for RFID applications. It offers linear and mixed-signal ICs; microchips for access and immobilizer systems, livestock identification tags, near field communications, and access control and interrogator or reader systems; and high and low frequency transponder ICs. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SICT.BK.long_name: Silicon Craft Technology Public Company Limited
SICT.BK.summary: Silicon Craft Technology Public Company Limited, an integrated circuit (IC) design company, designs, markets, and sells microchips for RFID applications. It offers linear and mixed-signal ICs; microchips for access and immobilizer systems, livestock identification tags, near field communications, and access control and interrogator or reader systems; and high and low frequency transponder ICs. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SIMAT-R.BK.summary: Simat Technologies Public Company Limited distributes computer hardware, software, and network accessories in Thailand and Malaysia. The company also offers computer information technology system development services. It sells various hardware products, such as corded and cordless barcode scanners, micro kiosks, mobile printers, barcode and label printers, card printers, face recognition products, mobile computers, wireless and networking products, RFID barcode readers and printers, and RFID antennas. The company also provides various software products comprising ManageSales, a sales force automation system; ManageWare, a warehouse management system solution; MobileNET; and Sky Frog. In addition, it manufactures self-adhesive label stickers, such as ribbonless, ESD, high temperature, healthcare, and barcode and serialize labels. Further, the company offers project management, implementation and training, helpdesk support, software customization and maintenance, custom software development, and technical services. Simat Technologies Public Company Limited was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SIMAT.BK.summary: Simat Technologies Public Company Limited distributes computer hardware, software, and network accessories in Thailand and Malaysia. The company also offers computer information technology system development services. It sells various hardware products, such as corded and cordless barcode scanners, micro kiosks, mobile printers, barcode and label printers, card printers, face recognition products, mobile computers, wireless and networking products, RFID barcode readers and printers, and RFID antennas. The company also provides various software products comprising ManageSales, a sales force automation system; ManageWare, a warehouse management system solution; MobileNET; and Sky Frog. In addition, it manufactures self-adhesive label stickers, such as ribbonless, ESD, high temperature, healthcare, and barcode and serialize labels. Further, the company offers project management, implementation and training, helpdesk support, software customization and maintenance, custom software development, and technical services. Simat Technologies Public Company Limited was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SIS.BK.summary: SiS Distribution (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, distributes computer components, smartphones, and office automation equipment in Thailand. The company operates through four segments: Commercial Products, Consumer Products, Value Added Products, and Phones. It offers servers, home and business PCs, storage and networking devices, printers/scanners, and monitors; and private cloud, enterprise storage and backup, and security services. The company is also involved in the service and rental of computers and accessories. SiS Distribution (Thailand) Public Company Limited was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SKY.BK.summary: Sky ICT Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiary, engages in information and communication technology (ICT), and system integration businesses in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: System Integration, Sales and Service, and Finance Lease segments. It offers consultation, design, installation, maintenance, procurement, and distribution of products and equipment related to the ICT and system integration. The company also provides CCTV, smart office, smart home, smart city, networks infrastructure, cyber security, and unified communication solutions; and network cabling services, including network cable management, single and multi-mode fiber optic cabling, LAN installation and cable management, and rack cabinet installation for network and server/CCTV security installation. In addition, it distributes IT products, such as computer, notebook, scanner, printer, toner, server, storage, switch, and software products; and non-IT solutions. Further, the company is involved in the finance lease business. Sky ICT Public Company Limited serves clients in the education, banking, security, government, and other sectors. The company was formerly known as CCN-TECH Public Company Limited and changed its name to Sky ICT Public Company Limited July 2017. Sky ICT Public Company Limited was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SMT-R.BK.summary: Stars Microelectronics (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides electronics manufacturing services in Thailand and the United States. It operates through two segments, Microelectronics Module Assembly and Integrated Circuit (IC) Packaging. The company is involved in the manufacture and distribution of integrated circuit boards and radio frequency identification tags; and equipment used to generate electricity from solar energy or alternative energy. It also engages in the generation and distribution of electricity from solar energy or alternative energy; and trading business. The company provides services to original equipment manufacturers, original design manufacturer, and outsourced assembly and test that offers IC packaging services. Its services cover IC packaging and testing; print circuit board assembly (PCBA) and box build, which cover Internet of Things, medical, energy management, and automotive devices, as well as industrial control modules; and fiber optics devices comprising data center, broadcasting, and LiDAR applications. The company serves electronic equipment, automobiles, medical equipment, communications, and entertainment industries. Stars Microelectronics (Thailand) Public Company Limited was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Phra Nakhon Si Ayutthaya, Thailand.

SMT.BK.summary: Stars Microelectronics (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides electronics manufacturing services in Thailand and the United States. It operates through two segments, Microelectronics Module Assembly and Integrated Circuit (IC) Packaging. The company is involved in the manufacture and distribution of integrated circuit boards and radio frequency identification tags; and equipment used to generate electricity from solar energy or alternative energy. It also engages in the generation and distribution of electricity from solar energy or alternative energy; and trading business. The company provides services to original equipment manufacturers, original design manufacturer, and outsourced assembly and test that offers IC packaging services. Its services cover IC packaging and testing; print circuit board assembly (PCBA) and box build, which cover Internet of Things, medical, energy management, and automotive devices, as well as industrial control modules; and fiber optics devices comprising data center, broadcasting, and LiDAR applications. The company serves electronic equipment, automobiles, medical equipment, communications, and entertainment industries. Stars Microelectronics (Thailand) Public Company Limited was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Phra Nakhon Si Ayutthaya, Thailand.

SNC-R.BK.summary: SNC Former Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells component parts for automobile air conditioners and cooling machines in Thailand and internationally. It is also involved in the contract manufacturing and assembly of air conditioners for household use. In addition, the company manufactures plastic parts for electric appliance and automobiles; household and automotive air conditioner parts; heat pumps for water heat pumps; insulation copper price kits used for the installation of cooling machines and foam pipe insulation; and tools for equipment. Further, it engages in the generation of biomass electric plant garbage; and invests in alternative power plant. SNC Former Public Company Limited was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Samutprakarn, Thailand.

SNC.BK.summary: SNC Former Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells component parts for automobile air conditioners and cooling machines in Thailand and internationally. It is also involved in the contract manufacturing and assembly of air conditioners for household use. In addition, the company manufactures plastic parts for electric appliance and automobiles; household and automotive air conditioner parts; heat pumps for water heat pumps; insulation copper price kits used for the installation of cooling machines and foam pipe insulation; and tools for equipment. Further, it engages in the generation of biomass electric plant garbage; and invests in alternative power plant. SNC Former Public Company Limited was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Samutprakarn, Thailand.

SOLAR-R.BK.summary: Solartron Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, distributes, sells, and installs solar-cell systems and related equipment in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through Selling and Installation of Solar-Cell Systems, Distribution SolarÂCell, Sale of Electricity, Hire of Work, and Other segments. It also constructs solar power plants; and produces and distributes electricity from solar energy. The company was incorporated in 1986 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SOLAR.BK.summary: Solartron Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, distributes, sells, and installs solar-cell systems and related equipment in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through Selling and Installation of Solar-Cell Systems, Distribution SolarÂCell, Sale of Electricity, Hire of Work, and Other segments. It also constructs solar power plants; and produces and distributes electricity from solar energy. The company was incorporated in 1986 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SPVI.BK.short_name: S P V I PUBLIC COMPANY LIMITED
SPVI.BK.long_name: S P V I Public Company Limited
SPVI.BK.summary: S P V I Public Company Limited engages in the distribution of computers, mobile phones, and related accessories and services in Thailand. It also resells Apple products, including computers, iOS devices, and various other accessories. In addition, the company distributes products compatible with Apple, such as hard drives for video storage, portable hard drives, and printed and graphic products; and products associated with iOS devices comprising speakers, headphones, protective cases, and screen protectors. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 57 branches. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

SVI.BK.summary: SVI Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides electronic manufacturing services in Asia and Europe. The company operates in three segments: Industrial Control System, Communication Network, and Automotive & Transportation. It offers manufacturing and solution-oriented services, such as industrial electronics and microelectronics for telecommunications components, specialized electronic assemblies, and medical technologies industries. The company also provides new product introduction, joint development engineering, design for manufacturing, supply chain optimization, prototyping, failure analysis and risk management, testing, product transfer, and reverse logistics management. In addition, it provides electronic manufacturing systems that produce full box-build and system build product solutions; and raw material sourcing services. The company serves industrial control, automotive and transportation, medical, communications and networks, audio/video, clean energy, microelectronics, and photonics and lighting markets. The company was formerly known as Semiconductor Venture International Limited. SVI Public Company Limited was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Pathumthani, Thailand.

SVOA-R.BK.summary: SVOA Public Company Limited provides information technology (IT) products and services in Thailand. The company operates through IT Distribution, Systems Integration, and IT Project segments. It distributes IT products, such as computer equipment, peripherals, and software; assembles and distributes computers under SVOA Computer brand name through partners and authorized dealers; and provides repair and maintenance services for IT products through 11 SVOA service centers, and approximately 108 authorized SVOA service providers. The company also offers IT consulting services, system implementation, networking products, computer security system equipment, and end-to-end IT solutions for financial and banking institutions, telecommunication companies, manufacturing and insurance industries, savings cooperatives, hospitals, government agencies, state enterprises, and private organizations, as well as data processing center, information technology management, and maintenance services. In addition, it provides computer system infrastructure services, including ATM outsource co-location, dedicated server, Web and email hosting, and disaster recovery support; computer products and IT equipment; installation and after-sales services; and digital applications for financial institution and government sector. Further, the company is involved in the sale of computer spare parts and other related equipment. The company was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SVOA.BK.summary: SVOA Public Company Limited provides information technology (IT) products and services in Thailand. The company operates through IT Distribution, Systems Integration, and IT Project segments. It distributes IT products, such as computer equipment, peripherals, and software; assembles and distributes computers under SVOA Computer brand name through partners and authorized dealers; and provides repair and maintenance services for IT products through 11 SVOA service centers, and approximately 108 authorized SVOA service providers. The company also offers IT consulting services, system implementation, networking products, computer security system equipment, and end-to-end IT solutions for financial and banking institutions, telecommunication companies, manufacturing and insurance industries, savings cooperatives, hospitals, government agencies, state enterprises, and private organizations, as well as data processing center, information technology management, and maintenance services. In addition, it provides computer system infrastructure services, including ATM outsource co-location, dedicated server, Web and email hosting, and disaster recovery support; computer products and IT equipment; installation and after-sales services; and digital applications for financial institution and government sector. Further, the company is involved in the sale of computer spare parts and other related equipment. The company was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SYNEX-R.BK.summary: Synnex (Thailand) Public Company Limited distributes computers, computer peripherals, software, IT systems, computer consumables, and communication devices in Thailand and Indochina markets. It distributes mobile phones and tablets; personal computers; and PC components comprising motherboard/mainboard, hard disk drives (HDD), solid-state drives (SDD), central processing unit, dynamic random access memory, video graphics array, power supply units, and computer cases. The company also offers PC monitor, mouse, keyboards, speakers, headsets, mobile phone accessories, web/video cameras, optical disk drives, projectors, uninterruptible power supply, inkjet and laser printers, all-in-one/multi-function printers, dot matrix and plotter printers, pocket photo printers, scanners, sewing machines, ink cartridges, toners, printer ribbons, USB flash drives, and external HDD/external SDD. In addition, it provides commercial notebooks, digital signages, closed circuit televisions, barcode and labelling equipment, servers, network attached storage products, switches, routers, LAN cards, wireless LANs, network cabling systems, network management software and hardware, network security or firewall, and network accessories; and cloud services. Further, the company offers smart watches, wristband and smart eyewear, virtual reality glasses and headsets, drones, underwater scooters, smart light bulbs, internet protocol cameras, industrial network products, and education robots; IoT products; and general and technical services and maintenance for network devices, servers, and various applications software. It serves computer retailers and wholesalers, software solution providers, computer manufacturers, department stores, superstores, and stationary shops. The company was formerly known as Compex (Thailand) Company Limited and changed its name to Synnex (Thailand) Public Company Limited in 2002. Synnex (Thailand) Public Company Limited was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SYNEX.BK.summary: Synnex (Thailand) Public Company Limited distributes computers, computer peripherals, software, IT systems, computer consumables, and communication devices in Thailand and Indochina markets. It distributes mobile phones and tablets; personal computers; and PC components comprising motherboard/mainboard, hard disk drives (HDD), solid-state drives (SDD), central processing unit, dynamic random access memory, video graphics array, power supply units, and computer cases. The company also offers PC monitor, mouse, keyboards, speakers, headsets, mobile phone accessories, web/video cameras, optical disk drives, projectors, uninterruptible power supply, inkjet and laser printers, all-in-one/multi-function printers, dot matrix and plotter printers, pocket photo printers, scanners, sewing machines, ink cartridges, toners, printer ribbons, USB flash drives, and external HDD/external SDD. In addition, it provides commercial notebooks, digital signages, closed circuit televisions, barcode and labelling equipment, servers, network attached storage products, switches, routers, LAN cards, wireless LANs, network cabling systems, network management software and hardware, network security or firewall, and network accessories; and cloud services. Further, the company offers smart watches, wristband and smart eyewear, virtual reality glasses and headsets, drones, underwater scooters, smart light bulbs, internet protocol cameras, industrial network products, and education robots; IoT products; and general and technical services and maintenance for network devices, servers, and various applications software. It serves computer retailers and wholesalers, software solution providers, computer manufacturers, department stores, superstores, and stationary shops. The company was formerly known as Compex (Thailand) Company Limited and changed its name to Synnex (Thailand) Public Company Limited in 2002. Synnex (Thailand) Public Company Limited was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TEAM.BK.summary: Team Precision Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, produces and assembles printed circuit and electronics circuit boards in Thailand and internationally. The company offers electronics manufacturing services, such as through-hole assembly; surface mount technology assembly; fine pitch ball grid array, flip chip, and chip-on-board assembly in clean-room environment; de-ionized water-cleaning; chemical compound encapsulation; and box build and retail packing services. It also provides design and prototyping services consisting of design for manufacturing, design for test, PCB layout design, and complete product software and hardware design. In addition, the company offers logistics and warehousing services comprising build to order, configure to order, fulfillment warehouse, hub warehousing with online monitoring, and overseas milk run services. The company serves customers in the industrial, medical, specialty, telecommunication, automotive, and consumer industries. Team Precision Public Company Limited is headquartered in Mueang Prachinburi, Thailand.

THCOM-R.BK.summary: Thaicom Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides transponder services for domestic and international communications. The company operates through three segments: Satellite and Related Services, Internet and Media Services, and Telephone Business Abroad. It also offers broadband content, internet data center, Internet, satellite uplink-downlink, broadcasting television, telecommunications, telephone network, and mobile content services. In addition, the company sells user terminal iPSTAR, as well as direct television equipment. Further, it is involved in the provision of technical support services in relation to satellite business, as well as engineering and development services on communication technology and electronics; and system integration consultancy services for broadband networks. The company has operations in Thailand, Singapore, Lao PDR, Australia, New Zealand, Mauritius, the British Virgin Islands, Japan, and India. Thaicom Public Company Limited was founded in 1991 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

THCOM.BK.summary: Thaicom Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides transponder services for domestic and international communications. The company operates through three segments: Satellite and Related Services, Internet and Media Services, and Telephone Business Abroad. It also offers broadband content, internet data center, Internet, satellite uplink-downlink, broadcasting television, telecommunications, telephone network, and mobile content services. In addition, the company sells user terminal iPSTAR, as well as direct television equipment. Further, it is involved in the provision of technical support services in relation to satellite business, as well as engineering and development services on communication technology and electronics; and system integration consultancy services for broadband networks. The company has operations in Thailand, Singapore, Lao PDR, Australia, New Zealand, Mauritius, the British Virgin Islands, Japan, and India. Thaicom Public Company Limited was founded in 1991 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

TPS-R.BK.long_name: The Practical Solution Public Company Limited
TPS-R.BK.summary: The Practical Solution Public Company Limited provides solutions for network computing and e-business. It engages in the distribution and installation of computer network systems, fully integrated communication systems, wireless communication systems, network security systems, and data center solutions and management systems. The company also offers consultancy services, such as LAN/WAN infrastructure, intranet/Internet, security system, IP telephony, network management system, design and best practice recommendation, network troubleshooting, and network equipment assessment. In addition, it provides network system management and maintenance services. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TPS.BK.long_name: The Practical Solution Public Company Limited
TPS.BK.summary: The Practical Solution Public Company Limited provides solutions for network computing and e-business. It engages in the distribution and installation of computer network systems, fully integrated communication systems, wireless communication systems, network security systems, and data center solutions and management systems. The company also offers consultancy services, such as LAN/WAN infrastructure, intranet/Internet, security system, IP telephony, network management system, design and best practice recommendation, network troubleshooting, and network equipment assessment. In addition, it provides network system management and maintenance services. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TSR-R.BK.summary: Thiensurat Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes water purifiers in Thailand. It also distributes air conditioners, water filters jugs, electric appliances, and other equipment, as well as offers personal and auto title loans. The company was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

TSR.BK.summary: Thiensurat Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes water purifiers in Thailand. It also distributes air conditioners, water filters jugs, electric appliances, and other equipment, as well as offers personal and auto title loans. The company was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

TUUF.F.summary: Solartron Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, distributes, sells, and installs solar-cell systems and related equipment in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through Selling and Installation of Solar-Cell Systems, Distribution SolarÂCell, Sale of Electricity, Hire of Work, and Other segments. It also constructs solar power plants; and produces and distributes electricity from solar energy. The company was incorporated in 1986 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

VCOM-R.BK.summary: Vintcom Technology Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, trades in computers and equipment in Thailand, Myanmar, Cambodia, and internationally. It operates through Sale of Goods and Rendering of Services segments. The company also provides software and related services for computers. In addition, it offers various information technology solutions and services, such as servers, storage units, engineered systems or converged infrastructure solutions, cybers security, networking devices, database systems, operating systems, virtualization systems, middleware, software development tools, and database management software for data integration, big data management, cloud data management, and data quality and security. Further, the company provides installation, consultation, and computer system maintenance services; professional services; computer and network security monitoring, and outsourced management services to protect the digital infrastructures of enterprises; and installed-based renewal and project management services. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Vintcom Technology Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Vnet Capital Co., Ltd.
